#Installing EasyGSP

= Installing EasyGSP =

Easy GSP requires Java 1.6 or greater, an HTTP server (preferably LightTPD) and optionally MySQL if you want to try MySQL based virtual hosting with LightTPD.


*Linux*

There are a ton of tutorials on how to install all of the required for EasyGSP.  Simply google installation instructions for installing the following for your distro:
  * Install Sun's latest JDK
  * Install MySQL server/client (optional, only required for mysql virtual hosting)
  * Install LightTPD  (If you decide to build from source make sure you build with: --with-mysql ,--with-openssl)
